channel.title: Articles on Aeron's Tiny Blog.
channel.description: Recent content in Articles on Aeron's Tiny Blog.

item.title: An issue caused by using `series` with Multi Language and cause unexpected behavior - fixed maybe.
item.description:
First of all

Before I create a new issue or make a pull request with my code, I just want to discuss this issue first to make sure that I wasn’t misunderstanding origin code.

Cause I’m not a front-end or back-end developer, and I’m a new in IT : (

So I started a discuss in this neighborhood : )

item.title: On November 24, 2022, the tragedy in Urumqi, the voice of the people - Record 1
item.description:
The truth will be revealed one day !

We are all the witnesses to history .

Deads rest in peace.

What happened ?

A deadly fire at an apartment building in the regional capital of Urumqi, and people can’t escape to outside, they can’t even go downstairs, people outside also unable to help !

ALL THIS TRAGEDY Caused by the lockdown regulation of COVID-19 of China !

They Block the exit door !

But the dictatorship blocked everything, blocked all the accounts of the domestic media that told the truth.

The authoritarian government even faked the news to make things irrelevant and blamed to resident: the escape door is open and the residents didn’t go downstairs and escape !

What’s wrong with the world ?

Fucking China’s government of Dictatorship !

item.title: Previews problem while running hugo server
item.description:
What happened

There’s some operation caused 404 page while running hugo server .

Once you changed categories and tags during running hugo server , browser’ll jumped to 404 page after you click the changed categories and tags.

Multiple pictures contained

item.title: Installing Bilberry Theme
item.description: You will find all information to setup this theme with your hugo site on the official Github Repository.
